name: $$$ Royal - Mashup (186)

wave_0_per_point6=v = sample*1000000 + value2*bass*0.1;

wave_0_per_point8=//state 0 elipse
wave_0_per_point9=xs = xs + sin(v)*speed*atan(v*1.51);
wave_0_per_point10=ys = ys + sin(v)*speed*atan((v*10));
wave_0_per_point11=
wave_0_per_point12=x = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(xs*0.1)*cos(time*0.2 + xs);
wave_0_per_point13=y = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(ys*0.12)*cos(time*0.1 + xs);
wave_0_per_point14=
wave_0_per_point15=x = x*0.8 + 0.1;
wave_0_per_point16=y = y*0.8 + 0.1;
wave_0_per_point17=
wave_0_per_point18=r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(time*1.22) + 0.1;
wave_0_per_point19=g = 0.4 + 0.4*sin(time*1.307 + 2*y);
wave_0_per_point20=b = 0.4 + 0.4*sin(time*1.959 + x*2);
wave_0_per_point21=
wave_0_per_point22=xs = if(above(xs,1000),0 ,xs);
wave_0_per_point23=ys = if(above(ys,1000),0 ,ys);

wave_2_per_point16=y = y*0.8 + 0.1;

wave_3_per_point5=speed = bass_att*0.8;
wave_3_per_point6=v = sample*10000 + value2*bass*0.1;
wave_3_per_point7=
wave_3_per_point8=//state 0 elipse
wave_3_per_point9=xs = xs + (equal(0,q1))*sin(v*1)*speed*atan(v*1.51);
wave_3_per_point10=ys = ys + (equal(0,q1))*sin(v*1)*speed;
wave_3_per_point11=
wave_3_per_point12=
wave_3_per_point13=x = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(xs*0.1)*cos(time*2 + xs);
wave_3_per_point14=y = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(ys*0.1)*cos(time*2.1 + xs);
wave_3_per_point15=
wave_3_per_point16=x = -x*0.6 + 1;
wave_3_per_point17=y = y*0.9 + 0.05 + bass*0.08;
wave_3_per_point18=y = y*0.8;
wave_3_per_point19=
wave_3_per_point20=r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(time*1.789) + 0.1;

wave_3_per_point22=b = 0.4 + 0.4*sin(time*1.125);

per_frame_init_1=mv_x=64;mv_y=48;
per_frame_init_2=nut=0;
per_frame_init_3=stp=0;stq=0;
per_frame_init_4=rtp=0;rtq=0;
per_frame_init_5=wvr=0;
per_frame_init_6=decay=0;
per_frame_init_7=dcsp=0
per_frame_init_8=
per_frame_1=decay=1;
per_frame_2=zoom=0.95+.075*max(treb_att,bass_att);
per_frame_3=
per_frame_4=warp = 0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=vol=(bass_att+mid_att+treb_att)*0.25;
per_frame_7=vol=vol*vol;
per_frame_8=mtime=mtime+vol*0.1;
per_frame_9=
per_frame_10=q1=mtime*0.4-.05*time;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    ret.x = tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*1.00+0.5 ).x;
warp_4=`    ret.y = tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*0.98+0.5 ).y;
warp_5=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_6=`                      ((uv.xyy*q27
warp_7=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_8=`                      ).xyz*
warp_9=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_10=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q29
warp_11=`                     );
warp_12=`if(ret.x> q21*q13         && ret.x<= q24*q11        )ret.y += (noise9).x*.5; 
warp_13=`if(ret.y> q22*q11         && ret.y<= q25*q12        )ret.z += (noise9).y*.5; 
warp_14=`if(ret.z> q23*q12         && ret.z<= q26*q13        )ret.x += (noise9).z*.5; 
warp_15=`    ret.z = tex2D( sampler_main, (uv-0.5)*0.95+0.5 ).z;
warp_16=`    
warp_17=`    // .x = fastest layer, .z = slowest
warp_18=`    // slowly shift stuff toward the front, over time:
warp_19=`    ret += float3(-ret.x,ret.x-ret.y,ret.y-ret.z)*0.03, (bass_att-1)*0.1;
warp_20=`     
warp_21=`    // ERROR DIFFUSION DITHER - looks great
warp_22=`    float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw + rand_frame.xy;
warp_23=`    ret += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5)/256.0*3;
warp_24=`
warp_25=`    // darken over time
warp_26=`//    ret -= 0.003;
warp_27=`    //ret *= 0.99;
warp_28=`    //ret *= 0.97*saturate( length(uv - uv_orig)*200 );  // center only
warp_29=`ret = ret * (0.95 + (sin(mid)*0.05));
warp_30=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`
comp_4=`    float2 uv_echo = (uv - 0.5)*1.000*float2(-1,-1) + 0.5;
comp_5=`    ret = lerp( tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz, 
comp_6=`                tex2D(sampler_main, uv_echo).xyz, 
comp_7=`                0.50 
comp_8=`              ); //video echo
comp_9=`    ret *= 2.00; //gamma
comp_10=`    float3 retish = 1 - ret*(1-ret)*4; //solarize
comp_11=`    ret = GetBlur3(uv)*2 + GetBlur3(uv_echo)*2 + ret;
comp_12=`}
